ticket.summary: host 2542XN108L replace the GB300 tray with a GB200

links.summary: host 2542XN108L replace the GB300 tray with a GB200 Host

description:
This is a GB300 server installed, even though DCAMP says it is a GB200 [https://atlas.oci.oraclecorp.com/assets/sk-5d836773-4242-4610-a995-3eb26c2d481b]

and the rack is a GB200 [https://atlas.oci.oraclecorp.com/assets/sk-1c1bf8f7-9ecb-4af7-a6e8-8ff405e586b9]

comments.author: Jira Event Publisher Notifications
comments.body: Ocean has created an incident for this issue. (P1-4A47CD998A05A89AE0634313000ADA5C)

comments.author: Colton Prettyman
comments.body: Host is now showing as Not In HoPs. I am not sure who purged it but the replacement needs to be swapped in.

comments.author: Lisset Hernandez
comments.body:
First Comment:

This ticket is acknowledged and will be updated with the details shortly.

comments.author: Lisset Hernandez
comments.body:

comments.author: Lisset Hernandez
comments.body: As per reporter confirmation, closing this ticket https://dyn.slack.com/archives/C09LJM76QGP/p1770996481208469?thread_ts=1770238108.116409&cid=C09LJM76QGP

comments.author: Lisset Hernandez
comments.body:
Closure Summary:

1. What was the issue (1 liner): Tray swap request
2. What we did to address the issue (1 liner - high level): Tray swap done, new host is ingested
3. What was the Root Cause:  GB300 server installed, even though DCAMP says it is a GB200
4. Runbook was helpful - Y
5. Is this recurring issue - Y
6. Hours logged - Y
